title: KaizenJujustsu
author: KaizenJujustsu
content: I saw the new counter strike global offensive which is named counter strike source 2, and it is really look sick the new smoke mechanics and also the new shaders of gun. I kinda like it tho but i think my pc cant handle this game anymore XD.What about you guys, what do you think about the new counter strike source 2 game?

comments.author: MaterialMouse69
comments.body: Quote from: KaizenJujustsu on April 05, 2023, 04:39:31 PMI saw the new counter strike global offensive which is named counter strike source 2, and it is really look sick the new smoke mechanics and also the new shaders of gun. I kinda like it tho but i think my pc cant handle this game anymore XD.What about you guys, what do you think about the new counter strike source 2 game?The graphics is so realistic but i think i can't play that game because my graphics card is waving at me XDI'd rather play Counter strike global offensive 1 than Destroying my PC when i start playing Counter strike global offensive 2
